remarks: The inverse of a generating element is represented by ` <. A , 1 >. ` instead of ` <. A , 0 >. ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
vrgpfval.r $e |- .~ = ( ~FG ` I ) $.
vrgpfval.u $e |- U = ( varFGrp ` I ) $.
vrgpf.m $e |- G = ( freeGrp ` I ) $.
vrgpinv.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
vrgpinv $p |- ( ( I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> ( N ` ( U ` A ) ) = [ <" <. A , 1o >. "> ] .~ ) $.
